lenders.name: Robert Barbie James Ellie Emma Jesse
Durwood
lenders.loan_because: I don't have a lot, but I have enough and more. My simple life is embarrassingly comfortable, when compared to most people in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: I have seen what a big impact such small loans can have for entrepreneurs and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: Management Officer at U.S. Embassies

lenders.name: Stephan
lenders.loan_because: it is often the little things in live that can make the most profound difference

lenders.name: Aimee and Anne
lenders.loan_because: To make the world a better place for all and to do our part to contribute to the greater good.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people and building gardens

lenders.name: Darryl
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I use technology to help others help themselves.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: What little I can do can help others around the world, more people need to give.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I want to try to make the world a better place!

lenders.name: Dale
lenders.loan_because: It brings a smile to my heart to play a small part in encouraging and supporting other entreprenerial spirits, while at the same time feeling like we're erasing borders that segregate land into countries, but rather supporting one world under one God.
lenders.occupational_info: I have always been happiest doing my own thing, having my own business, working from my home.  I've been a gift basket designer, designed lawn signs to announce babies, written romance novels, and now, for an income, I am taking other peoples' dogs into our home while they are on vacation so that they don't have to put their beloved pets in a kennel.

lenders.name: Sherman
lenders.loan_because: I feel GIVING will help develope my businesses during the off season, because my work is seasonal, so I have to create other thing to do when the season is slow...call 1-888-834-9865 or 1-800-507-7222 code#CL3939
lenders.occupational_info: I work for AFL-CIO Union 835 Orlando, Florida which brings in ALL CONVENTIONS into the Orlando Orange County Convention Center, and hotels like the Walt Disney World Swan and Dolpin.  I help lay the carpet, build the booths, and take the CONVENTION SHOWS down when the SHOWS are over!

lenders.name: Galit
lenders.loan_because: It is a great way to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: My work requires me to spend most of my time sitting in front of a computer.  Since I am a consultant, I am at a different business every day and some days I work at my home office.

lenders.name: Amanda and Marc
lenders.loan_because: I want to be able to help make a difference... even if it's just one baby step at a time.

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate in my life and want to share with others who may not have the same opportunities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a major petrochemical company as an analyst.

lenders.name: LouAnn
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with 3 to 5 year old children in a public school preschool program. My job is to help these kids develop speech and language skills. In other words I'm a Speech Language Pathologist

lenders.name: Robin Locke Monda
lenders.loan_because: It is a form that allows for perpetual giving, within a limited budget.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people communicate better, by making their web pages, their advertising and their books attractive and easy to understand.

lenders.name: Tom and Glenda
lenders.loan_because: this is an excellent way to help people to become self-sufficieint.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world by helping people who want to work get the opportunity to build towards their dreams
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an office worker who helps manage medical programs for the U.S. Air Force

lenders.name: Carmen
lenders.loan_because: I think it's great people from poorer countries are not regarded as just victims. And I also think it's great to be a bussinesspartner!

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: Entrepreneuring can be  fun, profitable and a way to succeed in life.

lenders.name: Fred
lenders.occupational_info: Firefighter/Paramedic

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: It is more blessed to give than to receive

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance. Helping out hardworking, honest entrepreneurs just makes sense and is my way of giving somebody an opportunity to improve their life.
lenders.occupational_info: My work allows me travel and see other cultures, people and places. Those lessons are far more rewarding than my actual job.

lenders.name: barb
lenders.loan_because: i believe in assisting people to become self-sufficient and an important part in enhancing their community
lenders.occupational_info: factory worker

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: A way to help a larger global community.
lenders.occupational_info: Education and exploration

lenders.name: Kathy & Kids
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance,  and if what little i can lend will help someone then it was all worth it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the proud mother of 3 awesome kids!  I look forward to helping a many Kiva persons as possible.

lenders.name: Belinda
lenders.loan_because: I have been helped to suceed through the gifts and loans of others, so I know it works!
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the day to day operations of an A/C company by scheduling, billing, recording information and finding solutions to problems.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I've been very poor, and have been blessed to in a position to be able to help others. I feel this is a wonderful way to do that.
lenders.occupational_info: I draw and paint pictures, and make beads with glass and a propane torch.

lenders.name: Rochlani Family
lenders.loan_because: Life lived for others is life indeed; Life lived for self is a barren waste.
lenders.occupational_info: I meet business people who have lots of work to do but very little time to do it. I understand their needs and then work with technical folks who program computers to get the same work done faster and better.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: It take a village,right. With Kiva,the world is our village.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.occupational_info: I help musicians market their music and connect with their fans.

lenders.name: The Burkhart's
lenders.loan_because: Its very gratifying to give to others and know it will improve their life and that of their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Dianne oversees the operations and lending departments of TLC Federal Credit Union. Carl works in distribution for NW Natural Gas. David & Aaron are college students.

lenders.name: Jose Sola
lenders.loan_because: where else can you do so much with so little?

lenders.name: Sonja
lenders.loan_because: not helping when you can is just the saddest statement you can make about yourself

lenders.name: jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I started a business without having capital and also under the cloud of a 2.5 yr.  frivilous lawsuit by a competitor using the legal system to try and put me under. Hard work and ingenuity are only a leaping off point but funding is essential to a person's perserverence where ever that may come from. When it happens, the sun breaks through and your vision becomes crystalized.  I loan because I wanted my reach to be more global and soon my own business will do just that.
lenders.occupational_info:
The Eleanor Group is a spa & wellness marketing company that matches local people with local services through fundraising with schools & non-profits. We help day spas use their service dollars in place of their marketing dollars to effectively bring in more new local clientele. So those supporting the fundraiser get great discounted services, the spas get grateful new local people and get to support their community and the fundraising organization raises money quickly and easily. 

Everyone wins!

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: It gives me an opportunity to help out women who want to better themselves and their living situation by creating their own business thus helping them build self-worth and pride in themselves.

lenders.name: chastity
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great thing that I can do to make a difference for someone less fortunate than I with just a little bit of money.
lenders.occupational_info: I drive to clients homes and professionally groom their pet right in their own home.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: Supporting the dreams of others is just as important as following your own.

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: It is my way of helping those who are trying to make something of themselves to accomplish that goal.
lenders.occupational_info: Before I retired I raised corn and soybeans on a farm in Illinois.

lenders.name: Joe and Steve
lenders.loan_because: It just feels great.  Go ahead - help open the doors http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_Ti0qV5pbJM

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I understand that sometimes just a little can do so much.

lenders.name: CINDY
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others have the chance to support themselves, and this is an affordable way that I can do it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a customer service representative at a bank.  I help people decide what kind of account they need and open it for them.  If they have problems with their banking I help them find the solution.

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: I hope that those in need know that there are people who compassionately care for them.  I'm beyond blessed, and I want to bless others with what I have.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying to become a physician, hopefully to work with Latino populations either in the States or in Latin America, with an emphasis on preventive medicine. In addition to México, I have lived in Asunción, Paraguay, and Jinotega, Nicaragua, and have traveled throughout Latin America.  These three countries and their people, however, are especially dear to my heart.

lenders.name: Inguna

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: Give a man a fish and he can eat for a day, give a man a fishing rod.........

lenders.occupational_info: Growing plants for others to enjoy

lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach four year old children. I teach early reading and writing, math skills, and social skills.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: It' the right thing to do...

lenders.name: Tina
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back to those in need in my global community.  When I see all that I have it makes me want to share and change the lives of someone in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I have become medically disabled and so I have retired from my job of managing a 124 unit apartment community.

lenders.name: shannon
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help women in need who want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with school aged children with disabilities to reach their potential and become independent, with academics, socially and emotionally.

lenders.name: Shannon

lenders.occupational_info: working with others to get the best out of their investments in technology (computers and related applications).

lenders.loan_because: I support micro economics because I feel that it is human nature to desire self sustenance and so many individuals in the world do not have the opportunity to experience this simply by virtue of circumstance.

lenders.name: Jenn
lenders.loan_because: I want 100% of the money going to the individuals or community and not to sustaining or perpetuating corporate charities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with inner city students from cultures around the world. I provide opportunities for them to discover their talents beyond academics by integrating dance, drama and film making in to their educational experience.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Shera
lenders.loan_because: I know first hand as a board member and volunteer of a non-profit organization here in New York  that every little thing we can do makes a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: To earn a living I am in Human Resources but my passion is in the non-profit world.  I work with a group of women who deliver a program called "Circle of Woman" to woman at risk recovering from homelessness, addiction and abuse.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those that are trying hard to make a better life for their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I design  electronics communications systems.

lenders.name: Nicole & Chad
lenders.loan_because: It will give someone else a chance to provide for their family... Hard work should be rewarded...
lenders.occupational_info: Chad is a self employed commercial fisherman who sells to fish houses in South Florida. Chad loves his job and is fortunate enough to make a good living doing what he loves. I was blessed enough to be able to go to law school and now love what I do.

lenders.name: Marie
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy being of service to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I do gourd artwork as well as intuitive readings.

lenders.occupational_info: I Install sewer and water systems

lenders.name: Lend-a-hand
lenders.loan_because: My beer money can make a difference. Who knew?

lenders.name: JULES45
lenders.loan_because: Fifteen years ago I was a woman with a vision.  Getting a financial institute to loan me money was impossible.  I had no retail experience only a vision. I  wanted to help as many dog and cat owners in my community to understand the benefits of feeding a better nutritionally sound diet to their four legged loved ones.  My business is now very successful finacially and educationally.  I want to share as much as I can to woman with their own visions.  Empowering woman to move forward in business is healthy to any economy and I want to be a part of that.  JULES

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can and it makes me happy to lend a helping hand. The gift to me --which is really big--feeling less helpless about the state of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I write children's books and I'm currently working on a suspense novel set in South Africa.

i have been fortunate in life and want

artwork that is very demanding, with

I do diagnostic procedures of the lungs.

But I do all this for my passion which is travel

lenders.name: Mimi
lenders.loan_because: I believe that all of us who have enjoyed the blessings of  fulfilling lives should give back and extend the hope of future prosperity & success to others in need
lenders.occupational_info: I worked with troubled children, homeless  families, and young children with cancer, & diagnosed developmental, behavioral, and psychological disorders in children so that they could receive appropriate treatments

lenders.loan_because: I want do what I can to give others the opportunities to live their dreams, or provide a future for their families.

My life lesson: It is never too early to learn about our social responsibilities.

My family: Everyone
lenders.occupational_info: Most importantly, I want to be a good Christian & a good citizen of the world.

lenders.name: Teresa
lenders.loan_because: it's important to give people a chance.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.occupation: Grandmother, Mother, Mother Inlaw, Aunt, Friend
lenders.loan_because: I am a mother of five, mother inlaw of 5, grandmother to 11, step grandmother to 5, sister, aunt and friend but   more importantly, because I care.

lenders.name: Petagay
lenders.loan_because: I may not be as wealthy as a movie star or basketball player, but I can do my part to help someone who might not have it, as good as i do.Every little bit helps, and if everyone would give a hand to someone in need then we'd all share the wealth of giving and caring.
lenders.occupational_info: I enjoy teaching children and educating them about the world.

lenders.name: katie
lenders.occupation: full-time student, part time preeschool teacher

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life and want to help others reach their dreams.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: i want  to

lenders.occupational_info: Vaughan is the founder of a chain of eco-friendly organic restaurants called  www.PizzaFusion.com

lenders.name: Rhea
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others from economically challenged areas of the world realize their dreams and their childrens dreams...everyone should have a chance to make a difference in their lives!

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: We have been so blessed where we live and with all we have received, it is a privilage to help others through this organization.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I pick up coins dropped on the street and also save my loose change so I can donate it at the end of the year. lenders.occupational_info: I make websites.

lenders.name: Meghan
lenders.loan_because: Primarily, I want to help someone better their life. Making a difference in someone's life is very important to me. My mother always said, "give of yourself and you'll always get something back... ten fold".
lenders.occupational_info: Currently I stay at home and raise my three children. But, I also have a PT job at a juvenile detention center two days a week. I am a detention officer (prison guard) who watches over the residents. I have the best of BOTH worlds :)

lenders.name: Terri
lenders.loan_because:

lenders.name: Virginia
lenders.loan_because: It's a tiny step towards counteracting American foreign policy.

lenders.name: Gladys
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people achieve their goals.

lenders.name: Ed Oakley
lenders.loan_because: I'm very excited about this approach to making a difference in small ways around the world. I cannot think of many better  and more fulfilling ways to invest some discretionary funds.
lenders.occupational_info: We help managers and owners learn how to work more effectively with all the people associated with their business. We help them optimize the work environment so people WANT to work with them and for them.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.occupation: I am mostly retired but do spend a day teaching at a Montessori School and I assist with a diving te
lenders.loan_because: This is what it means to be a citizen of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with high school students teaching them a sport.  I also work with people who are at risk for a heart attack.  I teach them how to exercise for their health.

I love the idea of being able to give a hand up which helps someone I've never met build a future for themselves and their family.

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people succeed, a small loan will help people help themselves to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: truck driver

lenders.name: Lionel & Rose

lenders.name: Jody, Becky, Ruby

lenders.name: Vivian
lenders.loan_because: we are all members of one family living in one world.

lenders.name: Stemerdink family Zeist
lenders.loan_because: we want to give others a chance  to improve their lives

lenders.name: cheikh ahmed tidiane
lenders.loan_because: I want to raise chickens and sheeps on my father piece of land. We are 10 children and no work available. I need 1200$ to be able to buy the animals.This way we insure that we have something to eat and by selling the animals , we reimburse the loan and make anough profits to  continue raising animals.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a sheet metal worker but there is no job. I worked for 2 years in a cyber coffee that closed. I live from place to place. Not a penny in my pocket.Need to get money in order to help my father with the big family of 10 children.Raising chickens and sheps means having something to eat every day. Thank you all.

lenders.loan_because: reaching out to those in need makes us feel we have done something positive.  Helping and caring for others is what life is all about.

lenders.name: Martine

lenders.occupational_info: I was a stay -at -home mom. My children are all grown up now.

lenders.name: Kimberly

lenders.occupational_info: My husband & I buy single family houses and rent them to provide high quality, safe & secure housing for people who cannot afford to buy their own homes.

lenders.name: Randi
lenders.loan_because: We (Tom Jordan and I), want to support others in having a business that sustains and supports  them and their families.  We find it's essential to help others and Kiva has inspired us.
lenders.occupational_info: I enable people (infants, children and adults) to live healthier and more productive lives with the techniques and excercises and support.  Less pain, better function, better feeling.

lenders.name: Aimee

Audrey Hepburn
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother of two and my husband traines race horses.We live in Ont. Canada

lenders.loan_because: We need to help others when we can!  These loans help others to have a better quality of life.  Life is short. These loans are paid back to me 100%- I will just turn it around to help another.  I believe when you receive you must give back, the universe requires balance.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a kiwi living in San Francisco.  A few years ago I went through midlife career change to something I love that dosn't feel like work- gardening.  I am now the Kiwi Gardener in San Francisco and wish I had done it 30 years ago!! A married foodie, my husband and I travel as much as we can.

I would greatly appreciate a donation of $1000 but any amount would do. Thank you very much.

lenders.name: claudie
lenders.loan_because:
I find Kiva a very useful tool , for helping people in need all around the world.What I find the most interesting is lending money instead of giving money.
That's also a good idea to get news from the 
journals!.It's a so great pleasure reading them!

lenders.name: Patricia & David
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: We are in the rock business.  We sell stone made into material used in building.

lenders.name: Terrence
lenders.loan_because: I think it is important to circulate the planet's resources.
lenders.occupational_info: School Teacher  (retired)

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: Great way to help others
lenders.occupational_info: Computer Software Development

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people acheive their dreams.

lenders.name: Carla
lenders.loan_because: I have had the benefit of loans that allowed me to get an education and pursue a career in science. I think everyone should have that kind of opportunity and I hope I can pass along a little bit of help to someone else.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I'm trying to help make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I design e-Learning courses on a contract basis.

lenders.name: Pepino Suave
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Fun.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: This program is a great way to give people the opportunities that have been given to me.  It doesn't take much to make a significant difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that develops new medications for people who are sick.

lenders.name: Monica & Cody
lenders.loan_because: When I really needed money, a good friend lent it to me, now it's time to complete the circle.

lenders.name: Cascade DuSel
lenders.loan_because: I believe in microfinance and the impact it can have on local and global economies.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Spanish to American school children ages 11-14
